participant_1.background:
I live in Manhattan with my wife and two kids.
I get to spend lots of time playing and laughing with my kids.
i have bowled a 300 game twice in my life.
until recently i have never been able to sing in front of anyone.
I often take my kids out to dinner to remind me of my childhood.

participant_2.background:
I have a box of letters from my parents that I keep safe.
I find that spending time in the gym helps me to take care of both my mind and my body.
My feet hurt after long runs in my boots.
i talk very fast.
I remember singing along to Queens of the Stone Age with my sisters in the car on long road trips.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
Doing well, thank you! How about yourself?
I am doing great! I just got back from a bowling alley with my kids.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I am not very good at bowling, so I usually avoid it.
It can be a lot of fun, even if you're not very good. I have bowled a 300 game twice in my life, but I've been bowling since I was a child.
Wow, that's impressive! I've never bowled a perfect game.
Thanks! It takes a lot of practice. I'm really competitive, so I love to bowl.
I can imagine! It sounds like you're really good at it.
I think I am pretty good! What are some of your hobbies?
I love to go to the gym. It helps me to take care of both my mind and my body.
That's great! I used to go to the gym a lot more than I do now, but I still try to get in there a few times a week.
It's definitely important to stay active. I also love to go for long runs.
I used to run a lot when I was younger, but I don't really have time for it anymore.
That's too bad! It's really a great way to clear your head.
It is! I miss it sometimes.
You should try to get back into it! It's really good for you.
I might! Do you have any other hobbies?
I love to sing! I used to sing in a band with my sisters when we were younger.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I used to sing in a choir when I was in high school.
That's awesome! I love to sing along to music in the car.
Me too! It's so much fun to let loose and sing your heart out.
I agree! It's a great way to relieve stress.
It sure is! I'm glad we're both music lovers.
Me too! It's one of my favorite things to do.
